name: Turning Roads
description:
Hence its a replica  of bridges game , in this player walk in same speed and player use a single control to turn its way so its doesn't falls.

well documented and commented code 

Easy to understand it's functions.

you also get a user manual.

Thanks for Visiting . 

Hoping I am able to SAVE your Game development Time a little Bit

FEATURES:
- Addictive one-touch gameplay.
- 30 built-in characters with cute blocky style.
- Daily reward system.
- All assets (sounds, fonts, models, sprites, etc.) are free for commercial use.
- Easy to customize.
- Optimized for iOS and Android.
- Fully commented C#.
- Detailed documentation.
